languages.description: Languages objects represent each available language in Transifex.

code.description: The code of the language to get details

code__any.description: A list of codes of the languages to get details. This will fetch any available.

organizations.description: Represents Transifex's organizations. Every user can be a member of one or multiple organizations. Only the organizations the authenticated user belongs to will appear here.

slug.description: The slug of the organization to get details
